name: Watch new Baserow rows and send them as notifications to Slack
description:
Send new messages to Slack from new rows in Baserow.

This template was created by a 3rd party and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: make_templates_support@baserow.io

Connect your Baserow account and select the database and table you want to monitor for new rows. Then, link your Slack account and select the channel where you want to receive notifications. You can customise the notification message by choosing the categories you want to include in the message and formatting the message text.
